---
id: get-payment-slip-bank-slip-client-request-id
title: "Get a Bill transaction using the Client Request Id"
description: "Use this endpoint access the information of a valid bill payment by passing the payments Client Request Id."
sidebar_label: "Get a Bill transaction using the Client Request Id"

proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a Bill transaction using the Client Request Id"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/bank-slip/client-request-id/{clientRequestId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint access the information of a valid bill payment by passing the payments Client Request Id.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"cid":{"value":"ee9e1720-c9d4-441b-b1de-e0c07504454e"}},"name":"clientRequestId","description":"The unique transaction identification given by the client side.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
